title: Add Law/Legal blog card section and update Blog SEO metadata

requirements.summary: Add a fifth Blog card section for Law/Legal with a static generated image and update Blog page SEO copy to mention Law/Legal.
acceptanceCriteria: The Blog page renders 5 sections total (existing four + new Law/Legal section).
The new Law/Legal section includes: (1) an English title, (2) a short English description paragraph, (3) an with non-empty alt text.
The new section uses the same visual layout and styling conventions as the other Blog section cards.
The new section’s image is referenced via an absolute path under /assets/generated/ (matching existing blog section image patterns).
SEO metadata for the Blog page is updated so the description and Open Graph description reflect that Law/Legal content is included.

file_operations.description: Add the required generated static image asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/blog-law-legal.dim_1200x800.png, to be referenced by the new Law/Legal Blog card using an absolute /assets/generated/... path.

Update the Blog page to include a 5th entry in the existing blogSections array for “Law/Legal” with (a) English title, (b) short English description, (c) image set to /assets/generated/blog-law-legal.dim_1200x800.png and (d) non-empty alt text. Keep the same card layout by continuing to render via the existing map and the shadcn-ui Card/CardHeader/CardContent/CardTitle composition (do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing. Also update the setSEO() description and ogDescription strings to explicitly include Law/Legal content.

requirements.summary: Update deployment documentation/checklist to ensure the production build and republish flow is executed for identifier "sheik-tonmoy-islam" and verifies the new Blog Law/Legal image loads.
acceptanceCriteria: A production build completes without errors.
The live site under identifier "sheik-tonmoy-islam" shows the Blog page with the new Law/Legal section and its image loading successfully (no broken images).

file_operations.description: Amend the pre-deployment/general verification checklist to explicitly include verifying the Blog page now has 5 sections and that the Law/Legal card image loads successfully (frontend/public/assets/generated/blog-law-legal.dim_1200x800.png referenced as /assets/generated/blog-law-legal.dim_1200x800.png), and reiterate republishing under the existing identifier "sheik-tonmoy-islam".
